Directions: Each evening, massage a few drops onto your face, neck and d collet , after treatment serums or retinols, in place of -or on top of- your night cream.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
